parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the middle drive shaft can cause the rear wheel to lock up, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potentially severe injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: or clunking noise from the rear of the motorcycle
especially when decelerating or downshifting; rear wheel locking up; loss of power to the rear wheel.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the middle drive shaft can cause the rear tire to lock up, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: the motorcycle becomes difficult to control
the drive shaft breaks or separates
unusual noises or vibrations are felt while riding.

parsedComplaintsResult.issueCategory: Rear Tire Lockup Due to Drive Shaft Failure
parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The failure of the drive shaft can cause the rear tire to lock up, leading to loss of control, accidents, and potential injuries or fatalities.
symptoms: the motorcycle becomes difficult to control
the drive shaft breaks or separates
unusual noises or vibrations are felt while riding.

parsedComplaintsResult.impact: The insufficient strength of the front suspension can lead to loss of control, accidents, and injuries, particularly when braking or maneuvering at high speeds.
symptoms: The front suspension collapses or feels weak
the motorcycle dives or nose-dives excessively
the rider is thrown from the motorcycle
the motorcycle is difficult to control or stabilize.
